title: I hope Morgana will get a bit more than just W work honestly.
body: I love Morgana and I take her midlane where she really belong but I feel she is lacking. Her Q missile speed is way to slow next to Lux binding who almost is the same as Morgana (2s next to 3sec on level 5 as Lux is 2 second on every level) but she also have faster missile speed and it snare 2 target. I think something could be done to Morgana binding to make it more iconic than slower Lux binding.. I would like to have something attached to the bind. I can't tell what but it could be so much more. Her W is really bland and boring ability overall. It's a nice farming tool when solo lane but later in the game, everyone finish your creep before you can pick one. Her magic sheild is iconic but feel bland. The damage it block is fairly low and should be increased since mage are often seens elsewhere than mid. It's decent at best because even on support role there is more mage than before so if you don't invest on black shield early, it's basically popped by a basic spell. They could increase the ratio if base shield is too strong, so Morgana have to invest in AP as support to have bigger shield and Mid lane Morgana shine the most. I love her ultimate, but sometime I feel like I don't have any ultimate. Like the time it take to actually pop is huge and by the time it's going down, people either dashed or flashed away. I'm not here to ask straight buff to Morgana but I feel there could be more work to do on her future rework than Add charge on her W... Oh well..

replies.body: I just want them to leave Morgana alone.  I am tired of so many bad reworks,  I really fear that one of the few remaining simple champions that exist (Kayle and Morgana both) will be taken away from those of us who are either (a) starting the game or (b)  playing at a high enough ping rate, that our quality of play and enjoyment of the game will suffer as a result.

Kayle's problem right now (as it is with a number of the other champions) is that the runes and items generally don't suit her.  You can still climb with her...but the early game is not great because the runes just don't fit her.

As for Rework not being a bad thing, I have to say that, as a person who plays at a higher but stable ping rate, the reworks have not been that good for me.  Every single time we get a "the champion is now more skill-reliant", I find that I lose one more champion from my roster of playable champions.

I wouldn't be surprised if the root duration goes down significantly with the rework, because the only reason it's so long is to keep people standing on W. If W gets changed then Q can get changed as well to redistribute power a little more evenly among her kit.

They'll probably CertainlyT her up a bit. Maybe she'll have a dash or true damage somewhere (already has partial refunds on W).

Increase the Q CD alot, Increase the cc Length by a load scaling with level 1-5 seconds, widen it but slow it down even further, increase scaling so its a slow huge hit, so it will always be the priority to dodge or QSS rush for, buff dmg enough on W at later ranks (thats the pool right?) to promote going 1 for 1 in leveling rather then straight maxing one or the other. and make her the only champion that has That Hard cannon like CC, not one shot capable either, but if your hit, Oh boy you'll know it.
